Description: Directed by Josef von Sternberg.  With George Bancroft, Fay Wray, Richard Arlen, Tully Marshall. A criminal known as Thunderbolt is imprisoned and facing execution. Into the next cell is placed Bob Morgan, an innocent man who has been framed and who is in love with Thunderbolt's girl, without knowing of their relationship. Thunderbolt hopes to stave off the execution long enough to kill young Morgan for romancing his girl.
